Hacking_TimeChanges.description: Incompatible with mods that change hacking

Horizontal_Psi_Hypos.description: One cell wide horizontally and two cells tall vertically.

GUTS_ZeroG_Turrets_Removal.display_name: Remove Turrets in G.U.T.S. Zero-G Cargo Tunnel

Psi_Aptitude_NightmareHeat_Removal.display_name: Psionic Aptitude neuromods cannot attract the Nightmare

WaterCooler_PsychicWater_Removal.display_name: Psychic Water does not apply to water coolers

Recycling_Immune_Chipsets.display_name: Chipsets cannot be destroyed with Recycler Charges

NonEssential_StoryItem_Recycling.display_name: Cosmetic story items can be recycled

Email_Formatting_Fix.display_name: Fix for switched To: From: in an email

No_MedOp_O2.display_name: Medical Operators do not restore oxygen

QBeam_AoE_NoBlindness.display_name: AoE Q-Beam blasts can't give unimplemented Blindess trauma

NoChipsetAsphyxiationResist.display_name: Suit chipset for physical damage resistance no longer protects against asphyxiation

Artrax_Quest_NotASideQuest.display_name: ARTAX acquisition no longer labeled a side quest

MedOp_Endgame_Igwe.display_name: Medical Operator inclusion in the Endgame

MorganWorkstation_Lobby_LVL4Hack.display_name: More logical hack requirement for Morgan's Lobby workstation

CargoBayA_DuplicateCard.display_name: Duplicate for Austin Cool's Cargo Bay A keycard

NMDiv_Fix_UnreachableJunk.display_name: Relocated unreachable junk item in Neuromod Division

Psychotronics_Remove_Resistor.display_name: Remove useless grounding resistor in Psychotronics

Mirrored_Mikhaila_Ring.display_name: Mirror the icon of Mikhaila's father's ring for variety

Remmer_Fix.display_name: Prevent Kirk Remmer's phantom from dying offscreen

Mass_Adjust.display_name: Adjust movable object masses for more realistic throwing

Fix_Psychotronics_LG.display_name: Fix Psychotronics LG button being visible through walls

Faux_Cigar_Removal.display_name: Remove some cigars on the floor that look real but are non-interactive
